item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "Everything in this room is edible. Even I'm edible. But, that would be called canibalism. It is looked down upon in most societies." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "A person who has good thoughts cannot ever be ugly. You can have a wonky nose and a crooked mouth and a double chin and stick-out teeth, but if you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Roald Dahl
Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you have a sister and she dies, do you stop saying you have one? Or are you always a sister, even when the other half of the equation is gone?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "There are two kinds of love...in the safe kind you look for someone who's exactly like you. It's what most folks settle for. But then there's the other kind of love. Everyone's born with a ragged edge, and some folks crave that piece that's a perfect fit. You'll search for it forever, if you have to. And if you're lucky enough to find it, it looks so <I>right</I>, you start to tear at your own seams, thinking, <I>maybe I could look just as perfect</I>. But then, of course, when you try to get close to their other half, you don't fit anymore. That kind of love...you come out of it a different person than you were when you started." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "It's disappointing to know that someone can see right through you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Enkh-orchlon add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Love is not an equation, it is not a contract, and it is not a happy ending. Love is the slate under the chalk, the ground that buildings rise, and the oxygen in the air. It is the place you come back to, no matter where your headed" -- Jodi Picoult
